suggest.meta_keywords: cors, error, edge computing, live streaming issues, M3U8 error, DNS configuration, CNAME registration, Azion console, troubleshooting streaming, tech support

current.meta_description: When trying to run live streaming, the player displays the message “Cannot load M3U8 crossdomain access denied”.
